features.title: Event Creation & Management
features.description: Create and manage events with ease. Set dates, venues, and track registrations all in one place.

features.title: Manage Participant Attendance
features.description: Effortlessly manage participant attendance and track attendance records, no need to manually get signatures.

features.title: External Participation
features.description: Allow students from other universities to participate in open events.

features.title: One Click Reports
features.description: Get detailed reports on event attendance and participant data in one click.

features.title: No Approvals Required
features.description: You don't need to be a Club to host events! Got an idea? Host it online and get audience through us.
